name: INTERNATIONAL AVIATION TRAINING, S.L.
about: International Aviation Training Services (IATS) is a premier flight training institution, specializing in FAA ATP and CPL training since 2006. Located in Miami, IATS offers comprehensive ATP-CTP courses, Airbus and Boeing type ratings, and recurrent training programs. With a focus on excellence, IATS provides world-class facilities and expert instructors, catering to both domestic and international trainees. We are leaders in FAA Foreign License Conversions and contract training for major airlines and VIP organizations. Our commitment is to deliver top-tier aviation training, equipping pilots for success in the evolving aviation industry. IATS ensures a high-quality learning experience, preparing pilots for real-world scenarios with experienced instructors and state-of-the-art facilities.
